name: St. Francis Borgia

locations.description: Third Superior General of the Jesuits

summary: Francis Borgia was a Spanish Jesuit priest who became the third Superior General of the Society of Jesus. He was a member of the powerful Borgia family and had been Duke of Gand√≠a before entering religious life. As Superior General, he expanded the Jesuits' educational and missionary work. He was known for his humility, despite his noble background, and for his administrative skills.
